title: Vintage Murrumbidgee
creator_credit: Russell Hurley and Russell Hurley Film Productions
brief_description: A tour of the Griffith area outlining the various tourist attractions such as the wineries and the recreational activities, festivals and facilities of the area. Narrated by Michael Cole.
